script:
1). Why can't we finish this report tomorrow?
Yes, because we will finish it yesterday.
Because it's going to be started now.
Because Mrs. Presley needs it urgently. 
2). You're looking sharp today.
Yes you are. Thank you very much.
Thanks. I have a job interview. 
Oh don't mention it. It's my pleasure.
3). How much more time do you need to write the article?
I did write it soon.
I'll do it tomorrow.
A couple of hours.
